How many people are affected by infantile neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis ?,"The incidence of infantile NCL is unknown. Collectively, all forms of NCL affect an estimated 1 in 100,000 individuals worldwide. NCLs are more common in Finland, where approximately 1 in 12,500 individuals are affected.",GHR,infantile neuronal ceroid lipofuscinosis
